title: vArayAmAsurAmi
sahitya:
vArayAsurAmi haridUta yAmyAnAdhika javEna


caraNam 1    vIkSaya pAshE navalayitamEnAm nirupama kadanAvahEna 
mA mAnayata vimuncata sahasA yUyamamumiti balEna
    caraNam 2    tadiha nishamaya vacO yamadUta jaga dUramunatakEna 
sampOSita hi vayam vinivArita vadata kEna kARaNEna
    caraNam 3    ita gaditAh shrI pankajanAbha nidEshakarA ninadEna 
punaridamU cura muniha vAridarava vijayE nipuNEna
